text: When the seas turn to blood and mountains are obscured by skull piles, our glory shall be revealed.
Even the most fleeting glance causes enemies to tremble as if their souls were being ripped from their bodies.
This is our hunting ground, filled with prey to be slaughtered. We are the singers of bloody ballads!
The endless blood of war opens the gates to Khorne's realm, drawing all beings into the Brass Citadel for his trials!
The endless blood of war opens the gates to Khorne's realm, drawing all beings into the Brass Citadel for his trials!
The endless blood of war opens the gates to Khorne's realm, drawing all beings into the Brass Citadel for his trials!
With a single point of Khorne's finger, endless chainblades wrap around cowardly flyers, tearing their wings and faith apart.
With a single point of Khorne's finger, endless chainblades wrap around cowardly flyers, tearing their wings and faith apart.
With a single point of Khorne's finger, endless chainblades wrap around cowardly flyers, tearing their wings and faith apart.
Our savagery and wrath spare neither friend nor foe. Cowardly maggots are unworthy of fighting for Khorne's glory!
Our savagery and wrath spare neither friend nor foe. Cowardly maggots are unworthy of fighting for Khorne's glory!
Fragments of blades from Khorne's failed champions fall from the heavens, erasing them and their masters forever from forgotten battlefields.
Fragments of blades from Khorne's failed champions fall from the heavens, erasing them and their masters forever from forgotten battlefields.
No rampart, flesh heap, or metal wall can withstand the wrath of this blood-soaked manifestation!
No rampart, flesh heap, or metal wall can withstand the wrath of this blood-soaked manifestation!
Dark Prince! Witness the fate of your pathetic servants! They now serve as tools for our slaughter!
Dark Prince! Witness the fate of your pathetic servants! They now serve as tools for our slaughter!
Fanatics chant Khorne's great name, summoning cyclones of blood to shred every resisting body in their path.
Brass chains emerge from purgatory, binding cowards by their ankles and cutting off every piece of the sky from their sight.
Brass chains emerge from purgatory, binding cowards by their ankles and cutting off every piece of the sky from their sight.
A massive blood-drenched hand appears above Khorne's foes, crushing their skulls into fragments with a single punch.
A massive blood-drenched hand appears above Khorne's foes, crushing their skulls into fragments with a single punch.
The skull of a faithful servant of the Changer of Ways explodes, showing those arrogant enough to wield the Winds of Magic their grim future!
The skull of a faithful servant of the Changer of Ways explodes, showing those arrogant enough to wield the Winds of Magic their grim future!
The skull of a faithful servant of the Changer of Ways explodes, showing those arrogant enough to wield the Winds of Magic their grim future!
Fanatics summon Khorne's great seal, granting allies tremendous vitality and spurring them to bring death and despair to their enemies.
Fanatics summon Khorne's great seal, granting allies tremendous vitality and spurring them to bring death and despair to their enemies.
Killing a servant of Khorne is never a mistake, but if you do, celebrate it as a testament to his glory!
